content.description: The following question is based on an excerpt for string orchestra that consists of an introduction (performed pizzicato) and a main section (performed arco).
content.question: The excerpt ends with which of the following types of cadence?

unit.text: 4: Harmony and Voice Leading I - Chord Function, Cadence, and Phrase

topic.text: 4.3: Harmonic Progression, Functional Harmony, and Cadences

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Use symbols and terms to describe melodic, harmonic, and rhythmic relationships in performed music. (This skill is applied in describing these elements in a full musical context.)
